en.aboutMe: üöÄ Hello! I'm Valentina, a Full Stack developer with a strong focus on React (Front end) and Express (Back end), boasting over 2 years of experience. I am a curious, passionate, and restless individual, constantly researching to tackle new challenges. I see myself as a highly collaborative team member and am dedicated to generating knowledge through teamwork.
en.hero: The machine cannot teach you to think, but it can teach you how to think better.

skills.title: My skills
skills.frontEnd: With a robust background in web application development, I specialize in Front-End development, leveraging key technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React JS, Bootstrap, and Tailwind.
skills.backEnd: My expertise extends to the mastery of essential technologies like Express, .Net Core, Spring Boot, Nest.js, and Django, enabling me to efficiently and effectively design and optimize the logic behind user interfaces.
skills.devops: I excel in agile methodologies such as Scrum and key DevOps tools like Docker, Portainer, MySQL, MongoDB, Sonarqube, and Linux. My expertise includes remote access to virtual machines and effective management of environment variables, ensuring smooth and secure deployments.

proyects.badjokes: I've built this application using React to access a bad jokes API, providing a fun experience. The app enables users to easily explore and share humorously deficient jokes in an interactive manner.
proyects.cripto: I used React to develop an application that consumes an API, classifying and displaying the current value of currencies and cryptocurrencies. Users can easily explore the ranking of these currencies, providing updated information in an intuitive manner.
proyects.rickandmorty: I implemented an application that uses React to consume the Rick and Morty API. The app displays technical details of characters, locations, and episodes, employing dynamic routing and efficient state management to provide a smooth user experience.
proyects.todo: I created a To-Do list using React Hooks and local storage within the browser via localhost. The application enables users to efficiently manage tasks with real-time updates and local data persistence.
